mil7.5.7:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘migassa tini angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani tini angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.5.7:1.2: “Yatha, maharaja, migo diva aranne carati, rattim abbhokase;
mil7.5.7:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena diva aranne viharitabbam, rattim abbhokase.
mil7.5.7:1.4: Idam, maharaja, migassa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.5.7:3.1: ‘So kho aham, sariputta, ya ta rattiyo sita hemantika antaratthaka himapatasamaya, tatharupasu rattisu rattim abbhokase viharami, diva vanasande.
mil7.5.7:3.2: Gimhanam pacchime mase diva abbhokase viharami, rattim vanasande’ti.
mil7.5.7:4.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, migo sattimhi va sare va opatante vanceti palayati, na kayamupaneti;
mil7.5.7:4.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena kilesesu opatantesu vancayitabbam palayitabbam, na cittamupanetabbam.
mil7.5.7:4.3: Idam, maharaja, migassa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.5.7:5.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, migo manusse disva yena va tena va palayati ‘ma mam te addasamsu’ti;
mil7.5.7:5.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena bhandanakalahaviggahavivadasile dussile kusite sanganikarame disva yena va tena va palayitabbam ‘ma mam te addasamsu, ahanca te ma addasan’ti.
mil7.5.7:5.3: Idam, maharaja, migassa tatiyam angam gahetabbam.
